about_the_game:
Step into the shadows of the Exclusion Zone

Become a war correspondent sent into the Exclusion Zone to investigate its secrets and document what’s happening. In the heart of radiation chaos, you’ll face dangers lurking around every corner. Your mission is not only to gather information and artifacts but also to safeguard critical data. Create stash spots to store your loot and leave flash drives with valuable materials—because if you don’t return, everything may be lost forever.

Game Features

Journalism in Survival Conditions

Keep a journal of events, document phenomena, and leave clues to help you and others survive. Every action brings you closer to uncovering the secrets of the Exclusion Zone—or falling into its dark abyss.

Interaction with Factions

The Exclusion Zone is inhabited not only by mutants but also by people, each with their own goals. You will encounter bandits, small mercenary groups, and other survivors who can be either enemies or allies.

A World of Deadly Challenges

Explore desolate lands filled with dangerous anomalies, mutants, and ruthless enemies. The Exclusion Zone lives its own life, and every journey becomes a unique experience where mistakes are not an option.

Stash System

You won’t be able to carry everything you find, so create stashes to store supplies and valuable items. Strategically manage your resources to survive the toughest challenges. Flash drives with documentary records are especially important, as they preserve your work and reveal the story of the Exclusion Zone—even if you perish.

Survival in Harsh Conditions

Monitor your hunger, fatigue, and radiation levels. Adapt to changing conditions: day and night cycles, weather, and unexpected events that could jeopardize your life.

Danger at Every Step

Fight enemies using various weapons and tactics. Each encounter demands a strategic approach, where timing your attack—or retreat—is key.

Atmosphere of Total Immersion
Feel the tension of the Exclusion Zone through grim landscapes, haunting sounds, and realistic details. Every step is filled with danger, and every decision could be your last.

Are You Ready to Preserve the Truth?
Your mission is not just to survive but to piece together the story of the Exclusion Zone. How far are you willing to go for the truth? Remember: your legacy depends on the data you preserve. Good luck, journalist—the Zone awaits.
